bands.name: Bebop Poetry
bands.text: When spoken word artist Kenny Gomes meets Martijn van Ditshuizen's jazz quartet, magic happens. Composition and improvisation blend together seamlessly as the audience is taken on a captivating journey.

bands.name: Artoise Big Band
bands.text: Artoise Big band is a modern big band, incorporating both jazz, funk, soul and pop music in their performances. The band was formed during Lars' studies at Codarts, conservatory of Rotterdam.

bands.name: Kris Ransijn Trio
bands.text: Kris Ransijn Trio consists of three young driven musicians. They play surprising and refreshing compositions based on experiences, emotions and musical styles from every corner of the world.

bands.name: Between the Lines
bands.text: Imagine yourself in New Orleans, marching with one of the second lines through the streets until the early hours of the morning.

bands.name: Jazzduo Salted Butter
bands.text: Butter is the basis of any great sandwich, but it has little flavor of its own. Much like the jazz standard, adding just a pinch of salt will make it a lot more interesting. Jazzduo Salted Butter takes the Jazz Standard with a grain of salt for a tasteful and innovative performance.

bands.name: Van Stralen Quintet
bands.text: Through a love for post-bop and the second Miles Davis Quintet, the Van Stralen Quintet was born.

specialbands.name: Blazers Collectief West
specialbands.text: Blazers Collectief West was founded for the Westland new years' concert. Directed by its musical leader Erik-Jan de With, the collective turned out to be a golden combination.

specialbands.name: Hoogland, Ransijn & van Stralen
specialbands.text: Lars Hoogland, Kris Ransijn and Elbrich van Stralen are constantly challenging, searching and finding each other in their improvisations.

gigs.name: Bebop Poetry @ Poëet Club XL Worm
Knallend Westland Nieuwjaarsconcert @ WestlandTheater De Naald
Westland Saxofoon Orkest ft. John Helliwell and Marc Scholten @ Societeit de Witte
